ch.unibe.iam.graph
Class UGraphElementFactory

java.lang.Object
  ch.unibe.iam.graph.GraphElementFactory
      ch.unibe.iam.graph.UGraphElementFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class UGraphElementFactory
extends GraphElementFactory
implements java.io.Serializable

Factory class used by default by a Graph object to create new instances of graph elements (edges, vertices).

Version:
$Revision: 1.11 $ $Date: 2003/03/19 14:00:37 $
Author:
Pascal Habegger
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
UGraphElementFactory()
          Creates a new graph element factory which produces undirected edges and undirected vertices with default vertex degree 10 and with the initial graph elemement ID 0.
UGraphElementFactory(int pEstmDegree)
          Creates a new graph element factory which produces undirected edges and undirected vertices with the specified estimated default vertex degree pEstmDegree and with the initial graph elemement ID 0.
UGraphElementFactory(int pEstmDegree, int pInitialID)
          Constructs a new graph element factory which produces undirected edges and undirected vertices with the specified estimated default vertex degree pEstmDegree and with the ID counter of graph elemements initially set to pInitialID.
 
Methods inherited from class ch.unibe.iam.graph.GraphElementFactory
getDefaultVertexDegree, getNewID, isDirected, setDefaultVertexDegree, setIDCounter
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

UGraphElementFactory

public UGraphElementFactory()
Creates a new graph element factory which produces undirected edges and undirected vertices with default vertex degree 10 and with the initial graph elemement ID 0. After each production of a new graph element using this factory, the ID counter will be increased by one.

UGraphElementFactory

public UGraphElementFactory(int pEstmDegree)
Creates a new graph element factory which produces undirected edges and undirected vertices with the specified estimated default vertex degree pEstmDegree and with the initial graph elemement ID 0. After each creation of a new graph element using this factory, the ID counter will be increased by one.

Parameters:
pEstmDegree - Estimated degree of a new vertex.

UGraphElementFactory

public UGraphElementFactory(int pEstmDegree,
                            int pInitialID)
Constructs a new graph element factory which produces undirected edges and undirected vertices with the specified estimated default vertex degree pEstmDegree and with the ID counter of graph elemements initially set to pInitialID. After every production of a new graph element using this factory, the ID counter will be increased by one.

Parameters:
pEstmDegree - Estimated degree of a new vertex.
pInitialID - Initial ID of a new graph element created with this factory.
